kv20.6:6.5: ‘idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
kv20.6:6.6: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv20.6:6.12: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv20.6:6.18: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv20.6:6.22: ‘idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv20.6:6.24: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv20.6:6.26: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādī”ti.
kv20.6:9.1: Mātughātako ānantariko pitughātako ānantariko arahantaghātako ānantariko ruhiruppādako ānantariko saṃghabhedako ānantariko, natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇaṃ, natthi nirayesu nirayapālā, atthi devesu tiracchānagatā, pañcaṅgiko maggo, dvādasavatthukaṃ ñāṇaṃ lokuttaranti.
kv20.6:12.1: Niggaho, puññasañcayo, aṭṭhāsi, atītena ca mātughātako.
